It's nice and all but, I feel like Shiori won't get her old self back again, and all her hopes and dreams are overwritten by the urge to become his "property" and if you think about it, it's hella sad. From the start she never had a choice. Yes, she was given freedom to live her life at first but, her destination was decided for her even before she had a consciousness, and that is, to live a life only for the sake of giving birth to an alien race.
Thank you so much to creating this author-san 😍

I think everyone misread this lol. He doesn't mind control her, he makes a point that he chose not to do that. Her blank expression is bc the sex is so good, not that she's mindwiped. Anyway, this was great!

I ... didn't really like this. The art is very nice, but the scenario is so one-sided that there's no drama, and the sex lacks both heat and romance. So, in the end, it just comes off kind of "interesting". And way too long for what little actually happens.
